properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Stonington, ME to Port Clyde, ME out 25 NM; Coastal Waters from Port Clyde, ME to Cape Elizabeth, ME out 25 NM; Coastal Waters from Cape Elizabeth, ME to Merrimack River, MA out 25 NM
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 7 at 3:13AM EST until January 9 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Gray ME
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 40 kt and
seas 5 to 8 feet expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Merrimack River, MA to Stonington,
ME out to 25 NM.

* WHEN...From 4 PM Wednesday to 10 AM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM WEDNESDAY TO 10 AM EST THURSDAY
